MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 14-NOV-2020 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut in the TD14 postcode area of Eyemouth. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete the repair due to an underground cable fault outside Dunlaverock, we now needed to carry out an emergency shutdown. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience This message was updated at 12:46am on Saturday, 14 November 2020.
